attributes.action: Listen to the people and back Boris Johnson for prime minister.
attributes.additional_details: Back Boris for Prime minister in uk
attributes.background: I think the people of United Kingdom want boris Johnson to be prime minister. I think it's unfair that this is decided by a select few in government. I believe the government should listen to the people and back Boris Johnson. It is as simple as that. It's time to listen to the people.

rejection.details: In any case, as you might already know, the Prime Minister of the UK is not chosen by the UK Government or Parliament.
